title: Legend: The Story of Poco
description: Picking up the pieces after the legendary Buffalo Springfield split up, Poco went on to define the genre of country-rock in American music. Poco has spawned a wealth of legendary musical talent and inspired generations of musicians from the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band and the Eagles to Restless Heart and Foster and Lloyd. As pioneers of a unique blend of country and rock, Poco s former members include Rock 'n' Roll Hall of Fame inductees Richie Furay, Randy Meisner and Timothy B. Schmit. LEGEND is the first book to document the development, evolution and legacy of Poco from its formation in 1968 to the present day. Featuring insightful and personal accounts from Poco members and associates, LEGEND illuminates the trailblazing career of this underrated and influential band.
author: Jerry Fuentes
